quizDescription: Test your knowledge of pop culture highlights from the 2000s!
quizTags: Pop Culture, 2000s, Aughts, Music, Movies, Technology

questions.question: Which popular social networking platform was founded in 2004 and became a global phenomenon, connecting millions of users?
questions.explanation: Facebook, founded by Mark Zuckerberg, revolutionized social networking and communication on the internet.

questions.question: Which fantasy film series, based on J.K. Rowling's novels, became a massive worldwide success throughout the 2000s?
questions.explanation: The 'Harry Potter' film series, based on J.K. Rowling's books, captivated audiences and became one of the highest-grossing franchises of all time.

questions.question: Which dance-based video game, released in 2005, became a cultural phenomenon and a staple at parties and gatherings?
questions.explanation: 'Dance Dance Revolution' featured a dance pad that players used to follow on-screen dance moves, creating an addictive and entertaining experience.

questions.question: Which teen drama TV series, set in the fictional town of Tree Hill, gained a devoted fanbase during the 2000s?
questions.explanation: 'One Tree Hill' followed the lives of high school students and explored themes of friendship, love, and ambition.

questions.question: Which music-streaming platform, launched in 2008, transformed how people access and listen to music?
questions.explanation: Spotify introduced the concept of on-demand music streaming, providing a vast library of songs accessible to users worldwide.
